instructions: Image titled Close Tabs on Galaxy S3 Step 10 1 Tap the web browser app. The process is similar for most Android browsers, including the stock Internet app and Google Chrome. Image titled Close Tabs on Galaxy S3 Step 11 2 Tap the Tabs button. The location varies depending on your browser, but is located in the upper-right corner in the stock Internet app and in Chrome. Image titled Close Tabs on Galaxy S3 Step 12 3 Find the tab you want to close. Swipe up and down to see all of the tabs in the list. Image titled Close Tabs on Galaxy S3 Step 13 4 Tap the "-" or "X" on the tab to close it. You can also swipe the tab to the left or right to get rid of it. Advertisement
